<li><a href="https://www.wcvendors.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WC Vendors</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wc-marketplace.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WC Marketplace</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://yithemes.com/themes/plugins/yith-woocommerce-multi-vendor/" rel="nofollow ugc">YITH WooCommerce Multi-Vendor</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wclovers.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WCFM Marketplace for WooCommerce</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>💥CUSTOM ATTRIBUTE (PRO FEATURE) 💥</h4>
<p>If you have added any custom attribute field to your product, you will get the product attribute list fields while creating a feed to assign your product&#8217;s custom field value to your channel attribute.</p>
<h4>💥CUSTOM  FIELDS &#8211; ACF,FIELD FACTORY,ETC. (PRO FEATURE) 💥</h4>
<p>This plugin supports the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-custom-fields/" rel="ugc">Advanced Custom Field (ACF)</a> or any custom field plugin’s fields as attribute values. You can assign your custom product attribute values to any feed attribute.</p>
<h4>💥PRODUCT META &amp; TAXONOMIES (PRO FEATURE) 💥</h4>
<p>Product taxonomies are more like attributes’ categories. Brands, size, weights have their own value, and they are considered the attributes’ value when applied in the feed. Using this WooCommerce product feed pro plugin, any product meta or taxonomy created by any plugin can be added to the feed.</p>
<p><strong>SUPPORTED CHANNELS:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.google.com/retail/merchant-center/" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Shopping</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.google.com/adwords/" rel="nofollow ugc">Google AdWords</a></li>
<li><a href="https://developers.google.com/product-review-feeds/sample" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Review Feed</a></li>
<li><a href="https://support.google.com/google-ads/answer/7166527?hl=en" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Dynamic Search Ads</a></li>
<li><a href="https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/2906014?hl=en" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Promotions Feed</a></li>

<h3>CUSTOMER SUPPORT TEAM</h3>
<p>We’ve a dedicated team of coders and wordpress experts to make your journey to us friendlier &amp; error free. So, if you want to use our plugin or if you are facing any problem with our plugin feel free to say us by emailing here: support@webappick.com.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:749:"<p>Before installing the plugin please make sure that</p>
<ol>
<li>Your php version is 5.4 or greater</li>
<li>WordPress version is 3.6 or greater</li>
<li>WooCommerce version is 2.4 or greater</li>
</ol>
<p>You can also check your system status and versions from WooCommerce &gt; System Status</p>
<p>This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.</p>
<p>e.g.</p>
<ol>
<li>Upload <code>webappick-product-feed-for-woocommerce</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Select &#8216;CTX Feed&#8217; from admin menu, Click &#8216;Make Feed&#8217;</li>
<li>Select the template and make feed</li>
<li>Done!</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:6513:"<blockquote>
<h4>Read <a href="https://webappick.com/docs/woo-feed/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation and FAQ</a></h4>
<p></p>
<h4>For Support Email to support@webappick.com</h4>
<p>
</p></blockquote>

<dt id='why%20should%20i%20use%20this%20woocommerce%20product%20feed%20plugin%3F'>
Why should I use this WooCommerce product feed plugin?
</h4>
<p>
<p>This plugin support all the sopping engines.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20ctx%20feed%20one%20of%20the%20best%20woocommerce%20product%20feed%20generators%3F'>
Why is CTX Feed one of the best WooCommerce product feed generators?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Being a freemium plugin, the free version is capable of generating a feed with almost every little element you need to make it perfect. However, the pro version can leverage your feed with lots of premium features like dynamic attribute (applying conditions on the products), attribute mapping (for modifying title, description, or other attributes), ample marketplaces to promote your products, custom template for more complex feed for a personalized channel, variations and variables setup, multilingual &amp; multicurrency feature, different output types for mapping the products, auto-update feature, etc. These features make it one of the best WooCommerce product feed plugins.</p>
</p>
<dt id='for%20which%20channels%20can%20i%20generate%20product%20feed%20with%20ctx%20feed%20free%20and%20pro%20version%3F'>
For which channels can I generate product feed with CTX Feed free and pro version?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Tou can create a feed for more than 100 marketing channels from high-range to any range. It is available for both free and pro versions. However, the pro version of this WooCommerce product feed manager allows you to create custom templates for your own bespoke channels.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20generate%20a%20google%20product%20feed%20for%20woocommerce%20with%20ctx%20feed%3F'>
Can I generate a Google product feed for WooCommerce with CTX Feed?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can. In fact, WooCommerce Google Shopping is one of the most key channels for feed generation. Therefore, we have not only put Google Shopping as a single channel, but we also have several templates of Google built-in the CTX Feed, such as Google Shopping inventory ads, Google Ads, Google Promotions, Google Dynamic search ads, etc.</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20do%20i%20generate%20a%20woocommerce%20google%20product%20feed%20for%20google%20shopping%3F'>
How do I generate a WooCommerce Google product feed for Google Shopping?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Check out the following tutorial.</p>
<p><strong>WooCommerce Google Shopping Product Feed &#8211; Video Tutorial</strong><br />
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QRTvrDJm4mI?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20can%20i%20create%20facebook%20product%20catalog%20feeds%3F'>
How can I create Facebook product catalog feeds?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Watch the following YouTube video to know more about creating the Facebook catalog feed</p>
<p><strong>WooCommerce Facebook Catalog Product Feed &#8211; Video Tutorial</strong><br />
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ml-KoFEVBHQ?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20any%20limits%20of%20products%20the%20plugin%20supports%20in%20a%20single%20feed%3F'>
Are there any limits of products the plugin supports in a single feed?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. You can create a feed with unlimited products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20any%20limits%20on%20product%20feed%3F'>
Are there any limits on product feed?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. This best WooCommerce product feed plugin is capable of creating an unlimited number of feeds.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20%20ctx%20feed%20auto-update%20product%20feeds%3F'>
Does  CTX Feed auto-update product feeds?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, This plugin offers you a range of product feed updating interval times. You can set your interval time, and the product feed will update automatically as per the scheduled time.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20file%20format%20does%20ctx%20feed%20plugin%20support%3F'>
What file format does CTX Feed Plugin Support?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It supports 6 feed file formats depending on the marketing channels you select;</p>
<ul>
<li>XML</li>
<li>CSV</li>
<li>TXT</li>
<li>TSV</li>
<li>JSON</li>
<li>XLS</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='does%20this%20plugin%20support.%20product%20variations%3F'>
Does this plugin support. product variations?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, This plugin supports both variables and their associated variations.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20is%20the%20difference%20between%20free%20and%20pro%20version%3F'>
What is the difference between Free and Pro Version?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The free version includes all the major functions but the Pro version has some awesome functionality.</p>
<p>Using pro version:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>You can filter products using price, quantity, product name</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>You can use custom taxonomies or other plugins taxonomy value into feed</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Using Category Mapping You can map your store category with your merchant category which is very useful for visitors to find out your product on the merchant site.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>You can make different prices for different merchants using Dynamic Attribute. Also, it is possible to set different values for different products using Dynamic Attribute Conditions.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>** CTX FEED Free vs Pro**<br />
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XEW8rSyEcSU?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
</p>

<h4>1.5.17(2016-07-03)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Fatal error: Call to a member function is_type()</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Fixed: Blank Screen Error</li>
<li>Improved: Feed Making Process</li>
</ul>

6:57am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2015-05-22";s:8:"homepage";s:51:"http://www.wunderfarm.com/plugins/wf-cookie-consent";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:397:"<p>WF Cookie Consent shows the user a clear message that the site uses cookies.<br />
This plugin supports multi-language installations with the polylang-plugin from Chouby or WPML-plugin from wpml.org. It has a wide array of settings for controlling the style and contents.<br />
WF Cookie Consent is the &#8220;wunderfarm-way&#8221; to show how your website complies with the EU Cookie Law.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:279:"<ol>
<li>Upload <code>WF Cookie Consent</code> to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>If you want to set custom settings, go to Settings menu &gt; WF Cookie Consent.</li>
</ol>

payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet AG";s:4:"slug";s:28:"woocommerce-novalnet-gateway";s:7:"version";s:6:"12.6.0";s:6:"author";s:49:"<a href="https://www.novalnet.de">Novalnet AG</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:40:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/novalnet/";s:8:"requires";s:5:"5.0.0";s:6:"tested";s:5:"6.2.2";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:16:"requires_plugins";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";i:86;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:3;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:0;i:2;i:1;i:1;i:0;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:4;s:15:"support_threads";i:1;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:1;s:10:"downloaded";i:86137;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2023-07-21 5:34am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2013-05-13";s:8:"homepage";s:41:"https://www.novalnet.de/modul/woocommerce";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:19505:"<h4>(German)</h4>
<p>(English Description down below)</p>
<p>Das Novalnet Payment-Plugin für Woocommerce bietet Ihnen eine Vielzahl an hilfreichen Features, die das tägliche Arbeiten mit dem Woocommerce-Shopsystem vereinfachen.</p>
<p>Wählen Sie aus den weltweit beliebtesten über 100 lokalen und internationalen Zahlungsmethoden die für Sie passenden aus, vom Rechnungskauf über SEPA-Lastschrift bis hin zur Kreditkarte.</p>
<p>Kreditkartenzahlungen sind zusätzlich durch das 3D-Secure-Verfahren abgesichert, um Ihnen als Shop-Betreiber noch mehr Sicherheit zu bieten. Damit gehört das Plugin der Novalnet AG zu einem der populärsten Extensions im Bereich Payment.</p>
<p>Das Plugin automatisiert den gesamten Transaktionsvorgang vom Checkout bis zum Forderungsmanagement und Inkasso. Darüber hinaus sichert es die Transaktionen ab und hilft Ihnen als Unternehmen dabei, Ihren Umsatz durch die folgenden Vorteile langfristig zu steigern:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsabwicklung/" title="über 100 lokal und international nachgefragte Zahlungsarten" rel="nofollow ugc">über 100 lokal und international nachgefragte Zahlungsarten</a> bereits integriert</li>
<li>umfangreiches <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/risikomanagement/" title="Risikomanagement" rel="nofollow ugc">Risikomanagement</a> zur Minimierung von Zahlungsausfällen durch mehr als 60 im Hintergrund arbeitende Betrugspräventionsmodule</li>
<li>Für Zahlungsausfälle frei einstellbares, optional kostenloses Forderungsmanagement inkl. verschiedener Mahnstufen</li>
<li>Automatisierte Rechnungsstellung für Ihre Endkunden</li>
<li>umfangreiches und kostenloses Debitorenmanagement mit diversen Exportmöglichkeiten für Buchhaltungsprogramme </li>
<li>Realtime-Monitoring, das Ihren Checkoutprozess in Bezug auf Kaufabbrüche überwacht, und Reporting </li>
<li>Ihre Gelder sind durch Treuhandkonten zu 100 % u.a. vor einer Insolvenz geschützt</li>
<li>Kostenfreier technischer Support bei Einbindung und Betrieb des Zahlungs-Plugins</li>
<li>Attraktive und flexible Auszahlungsmodalitäten</li>
<li>Optionale Mitgliederverwaltung</li>
<li>Spezielles Endkundenportal für Rückfragen zur Transaktion</li>
</ul>
<p>Einfache SEPA-Lastschrift-Lösung. Sie müssen kein separates Bankkonto eröffnen</p>
<h4>VERMEIDEN SIE MEHRERE VERTRÄGE UND VERSTECKTE KOSTEN</h4>
<p>Mehrere Verträge für die Zahlungsabwicklung mit verschiedenen Dienstleistern wie Banken, Kreditkarten-Acquirern, Anbietern von Betrugspräventionen, Inkassounternehmen etc. und mit unterschiedlichen Laufzeiten und Gebühren sind mit Nutzung des Plugins Vergangenheit.</p>
<p>Die Novalnet-Plattform sorgt dafür, dass Ihre Zahlungen in WooCommerce reibungslos abgewickelt werden, erstellt automatisch Ihre Rechnungen, verschickt pünktlich Mahnungen und verarbeitet auch On-hold-Transaktionen und wiederkehrende Zahlungen.</p>
<p>Ihre über WooCommerce generierten Transaktionen sind durch ein Höchstmaß an Sicherheit geschützt. Dazu wird die Novalnet AG jedes Jahr in einem umfangreichen Sicherheits-Audit nach dem Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) auf dem höchsten Level 1 geprüft und zertifiziert.</p>
<p>Die vielfach automatisierten Abläufe sorgen dafür, dass Sie Kosten sparen und sich auf Ihren Verkaufserfolg konzentrieren können.</p>
<h4>WICHTIGSTE FUNKTIONEN</h4>
<ul>
<li>Einfache Integration in Ihren Bestellprozess – es wird keine externe Seite für die Zahlung aufgerufen</li>
<li>Responsive Zahlungsseiten</li>
<li>Sichere SSL-verschlüsselte Gateways</li>
<li>Klare Echtzeit-Übersicht und Überwachung des Zahlungsstatus sowie automatisierte E-Mail-Benachrichtigungsfunktion für Zahlungsstatusreports</li>
<li>Automatisierte Berichte und verschiedene Exportfunktionen für Ihre Buchhaltung in XML, SOAP, CSV, MT940 u.v.m. </li>
<li>Kreditkartenzahlungen <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/service/3d-secure-infos/" title="mit 3D-Secure" rel="nofollow ugc">mit 3D-Secure</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/pci-dss-zertifizierung/" title="PCI-DSS-konform" rel="nofollow ugc">PCI-DSS-konform</a>, keine aufwändige und teure Zertifizierung notwendig</li>
</ul>
<h4>MIT DEM PLUGIN KÖNNEN SIE VIELES DIREKT ÜBER DIE WOOCOMMERCE-EINSTELLUNGEN VERWALTEN</h4>
<ul>
<li>Einfache Konfigurationsmöglichkeit für alle Zahlungsarten</li>
<li>Einfache Möglichkeit zum Bestätigen und Stornieren von On-Hold-Transaktionen</li>
<li>Einfaches Durchführen von Rückerstattungen aus der Shop-Administration heraus</li>
<li>Flexible <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/abonnementverwaltung/" title="Abonnementverwaltung" rel="nofollow ugc">Abonnementverwaltung</a> für wiederkehrende Zahlungen</li>
<li>Flexibles Affiliate-Management für Partnerprogramm-Betreiber</li>
<li>Sehr einfaches Konfigurieren des Risikomanagements</li>
<li>Einstellen komfortabler Statusmeldungen, z.B. für Zahlungseingänge bei Kauf auf Rechnung und Vorkasse</li>
<li>Bequeme E-Mail-Benachrichtigungsfunktion über Statusmeldungen der Zahlungen</li>
<li>Übersichtliches Status-Management für Chargebacks sowie SEPA-Rücklastschriften</li>
<li>Vorhalten von Bestelldaten bei Kaufabbrüchen</li>
</ul>
<h4>LASSEN SIE IHRE KUNDEN ZAHLEN, WIE SIE MÖCHTEN</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsart-kreditkarte/" title="Kreditkarte" rel="nofollow ugc">Kreditkarte</a>: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, UnionPay, Diners Club, Discover</li>
<li>Debitkarte: Maestro, Carte Bleue, CartaSi, Postepay, PostFinance, dankort</li>
<li>Online-Überweisung: Sofortüberweisung, Onlineüberweisung eps, iDEAL, giropay, Przelewy24, Alipay, WeChat Pay, Trustly etc.</li>
<li>Wallet: Apple Pay, Google Pay &amp; PayPal.</li>
<li>Vorkasse, Kauf auf Rechnung, Kauf auf Rechnung mit Zahlungsgarantie</li>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/sepa-lastschrift/" title="SEPA-Lastschrift" rel="nofollow ugc">SEPA-Lastschrift</a>, Direct Debit UK (BACS)</li>
<li>Barzahlen/viacash</li>
<li>Ratenzahlung</li>
<li>Direct Carrier Billing (Zahlen per Handyrechnung)</li>
<li>Kauf auf  Rechnung und <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/lastschrift-mit-zahlungsgarantie/" title="SEPA-Lastschrift sind auch mit Zahlungsgarantie" rel="nofollow ugc">SEPA-Lastschrift sind auch mit Zahlungsgarantie</a> möglich.</li>
</ul>
<h4>GEHEN SIE AUF NUMMER SICHER</h4>
<p>Die intelligente Novalnet-Betrugsprävention ist abhängig von Zahlungsart, Produktpalette und Warenkorbgröße. Durch zahlreiche, unabhängig zuschaltbare Fraudmodule verringert sich Ihre Zahlungsausfallquote spürbar.</p>
<h4>SIE HABEN FRAGEN?</h4>
<p>Kontaktieren Sie uns per E-Mail an <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> oder telefonisch unter +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<p>Weitere Informationen über Novalnet und zur Kompatibilität des Novalnet-Payment-Plugins finden Sie weiter unten.</p>
<h4>(English)</h4>
<h4>ACCEPT, MANAGE &amp; COLLECT PAYMENTS &#8211; WOOCOMMERCE</h4>
<p>The WooCommerce Payment Plugin from Novalnet allows you to accept, manage and collect payments. It is designed to optimize your payment processing, enrich customer experiences and improve conversion rates.<br />
Hundreds of e-commerce businesses across the world use this plugin to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Accept 100+ international &amp; local payment methods</li>
<li>Add new payment methods any time</li>
<li>Manage payments, subscriptions &amp; members </li>
<li>Secure transactions with proven risk management</li>
<li>Avoid own <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/pci-dss-certification/" title="PCI DSS certification" rel="nofollow ugc">PCI DSS certification</a> </li>
<li>Automate customer communication related to payments</li>
<li>Provide payment support for end customers</li>
<li>Follow transactions in real time</li>
<li>Automate reporting for bookkeeping &amp; other departments etc.</li>
</ul>
<h4>WIDE PAYMENT PORTFOLIO FOR YOUR ONLINE SHOP</h4>
<p>The WooCommerce Novalnet Payment Plugin enables access to <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/payment/" title="international and local payment methods" rel="nofollow ugc">international and local payment methods</a> that can be easily integrated to your checkout process already today. Your payment portfolio remains up to date and follows both global and local payment trends across the world.</p>
<p>Novalnet’s WooCommerce Payment Plugin supports:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><a href="https://www.novalnet.com/credit-card/" title="Credit cards" rel="nofollow ugc">Credit cards</a> (3DSecure also available): Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, UnionPay, Diners Club,  Discover etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Debit cards: Maestro, Visa, Carte Bleue, CartaSi, Postepay, PostFinance, dankort etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Online bank transfers: Sofort, Online bank transfer, eps, iDEAL, giropay, Przelewy24, PostFinance Card, PostFinance E-Finance, Bancontact, Alipay, WeChat Pay &amp; Trustly etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>E-wallets:  <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/paypal/" title="PayPal" rel="nofollow ugc">PayPal</a> , Apple Pay &amp; Google Pay.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Prepayment, Invoice, <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/sepa-direct-debit/" title="Direct Debit SEPA" rel="nofollow ugc">Direct Debit SEPA</a>, <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/barzahlen/" title="Barzahlen" rel="nofollow ugc">Barzahlen/viacash</a> &amp; Multibanco.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment by Invoice &amp; Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>More information about each payment method can be found on our <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsabwicklung/" title="website" rel="nofollow ugc">website</a>. If you have any additional inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> or +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<h4>ADVANCED PAYMENT EXPERIENCES FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS</h4>
<p>Novalnet Payment Gateway for WooCommerce ensures that your WooCommerce offers seamless payment experiences. It provides optimized customer communications and auto-fill of payment details for future purchases. Set up email notifications and reminders for payment status updates and offer valuable customer support through Novalnet platform.</p>
<h4>DIGITALIZATION &amp; REAL-TIME MONITORING</h4>
<p>Novalnet’s WooCommerce Payment Plugin integrates your shop with one payment platform that covers all payment methods and services at once. Save costs, manual effort and time with the following WooCommerce Payment Plugin features.</p>
<h4>KEY FEATURES</h4>
<ul>
<li>Easy configuration of all international &amp; local payment methods</li>
<li>Unified monitoring, reporting, and payouts for all payment methods</li>
<li>Easy to install &amp; configure without technical understanding</li>
<li>Plug &amp; Play &#8211; no extra plugins/scripts needed to process transactions </li>
<li>No PCI DSS certification required when using our payment module</li>
<li>60+ risk &amp; payment fraud detection modules to prevent defaults in real time</li>
<li>Secure SSL- encoded gateways</li>
<li>One-click shopping supported for Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee &amp; Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA</li>
<li>Zero amount authorization supported for Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Apple Pay &amp; Google Pay</li>
<li>Custom CSS configuration for Credit/Debit Card iframe</li>
<li>Automated invoice generation</li>
<li>Easy confirmation/cancellation of on-hold transactions for Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment payment for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit/Debit Card, Invoice, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment payment for Invoice, Prepayment, PayPal, Apple Pay &amp; Google Pay</li>
<li>Refund option for Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment by Invoice, Prepayment, Barzahlen/viacash, Sofort, iDEAL, eps, giropay, PayPal, Przelewy24, PostFinance Card, PostFinance E-Finance, Bancontact, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Online bank transfer, Alipay, WeChat pay &amp; Trustly</li>
<li>Automated e-mail notifications for staying up to date on the payment status</li>
<li>Clear overview of payment status from checkout to receivables</li>
<li>Secure end customer portal for payment inquiries </li>
<li>Fully-automated debt collection</li>
<li>Multilevel claims management with integrated handover to collection and various export functions for the accounting</li>
<li>Affiliate solution supporting frictionless onboarding, split payments &amp; currency conversion </li>
<li>Automated bookkeeping report in XML, SOAP, CSV, MT940</li>
<li>Free technical support upon integration</li>
<li>Dynamic subscription management for recurring payments</li>
<li>Subscription management (suspend, reactivate, cancel, change payment method, change next cycle date, change subscription amount)</li>
<li>Automatic order creation when subscriptions are renewed</li>
<li>Transaction amount update option for Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Prepayment &amp; Barzahlen/viacash</li>
<li>Order creation process handled for shop admin</li>
<li>Responsive templates</li>
</ul>
<h4>PCI COMPLIANT RISK MANAGEMENT &amp; FRAUD PREVENTION</h4>
<p>Novalnet provides all its merchants secure payment processing in a PCI DSS Level 1 compliant manner. More than <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/risk-management/" title="60 fraud prevention modules" rel="nofollow ugc">60 fraud prevention modules</a> are integrated to ensure machine learning fraud prevention and optimal risk minimization in real-time.</p>
<h4>AVOID MULTIPLE CONTRACTS &amp; HIDDEN COSTS</h4>
<p>This free WooCommerce Payment Plugin integrates your e-commerce business with Novalnet’s all-in-one payment platform to grow revenue. The integration and services are customizable based on individual customer needs. Novalnet’s prizing depends on your business model and chosen payment methods.</p>
<p>Please contact us for more information:<a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> or +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<h4>ABOUT NOVALNET AG</h4>
<p><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet</a> is a financial service institution offering payment solutions world-wide. We support customers all the way from setting up payment types and intelligent fraud prevention modules, to legitimate and reliable receivables and claims management. Operating in the market as a full payment service provider since 2007, we enable maximal reliability and client focus to all customers in every area of payment processing. Novalnet AG is a licensed payment institute which is regulated by the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin).</p>
<h4>PLUGIN COMPATIBILITY</h4>
<p>To process Novalnet payments through this WooCommerce Payment Plugin, a <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/kontakt/sales/" title="Novalnet account" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet account</a> is needed.</p>
<ul>
<li>Compatible with WordPress/WooCommerce plugins</li>
<li>Works with WooCommerce Subscription plugin</li>
<li>Works with WordPress Multi-Site</li>
<li>Supports Sequential Order Numbers Pro Plugin (Custom Order Numbers for WooCommerce)</li>
<li>Supports Debug Log feature  </li>
</ul>
<h4>REFERENCE</h4>
<p>Please check out our ssl certified <a href="https://woocommerce.novalnet.de/" title="Demo Store" rel="nofollow ugc">Demo Store</a></p>
<h3>Arbitrary section</h3>
<h4>Connect to WooCommerce:</h4>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Switch back to the WordPress admin area.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Click on &#8220;WooCommerce&#8221; in the menu on the left and click directly on the sublevel tab &#8220;Settings&#8221; tab there.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Inside the &#8220;Novalnet Global Configuration&#8221; tab you will have the Novalnet merchant global configuration. It will follow the below mentioned structure</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Product activation key</strong> Kindly enter the exact key from Novalnet admin area</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Payment access key</strong> Kindly enter the exact key from Novalnet admin area</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Select Tariff ID</strong> Kindly select the tariff from the list</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Subscription Tariff ID</strong> Kindly select the subscription tariff from the list</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Display payment method logo</strong> Option to display the payment logo for all payments. Logo will be displayed at the checkout</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Subscription Management</strong> Subscription settings</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Notification / Webhook URL</strong> Notification / Webhook URL settings</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Please click on the “Checkout” tab in order to configure your Novalnet payment interface properly. Inside the “Checkout” tab you will have the individual payment (eg. Direct Debit SEPA) configuration. The payment configuration is structured as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Enable payment method</strong> Option to enable respective payment. Payment will be displayed at the checkout</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Enable test mode</strong> Option for the respective payment mode to be in live or test mode</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Payment name &amp; description language</strong> Kindly mention the name for the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Title</strong> The freely configurable description entered here is displayed when your customers select the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Description</strong> The freely configurable description entered here is displayed when your customers select the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>One-click shopping</strong> One click shopping for Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA and Credit/Debit Cards.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p>Now, just the following steps have to be executed for going live:</p>
<h4>TRANSLATIONS</h4>
<ul>
<li>English</li>
<li>German</li>
</ul>
<h4>GO-LIVE:</h4>
<p>Now execute the following steps to go live and start your sales:</p>
<ul>
<li>Install the WooCommerce Payment Plugin by Novalnet directly from the WordPress repository </li>
<li>Find the detailed information in the Installation Guide (incl. in the package) </li>
<li>Configure Product Activation Key and Payment Access Key in the shop admin panel</li>
<li>Activate &amp; configure the preferred payment types in your shop admin panel </li>
<li>You are ready to go!</li>
</ul>
<p>Please contact <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> / 0049-89-923 068 320 for any technical issues or questions.</p>
<h4>DISTRIBUTION</h4>
<p>This plugin enables the integration between WooCommerce and Novalnet payments. The plugin is free and released under the GNU General Public License. If you have found this script useful, please let also others know about it! Recommendations as well as comments in the merchant forum will be appreciated!</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:2440:"<h4>Compatibility</h4>
<p>Novalnet payment plugin compatible for WooCommerce 4.0.0-7.9.0 and compatible for subscription 2.0.0-5.2.0.</p>
<h4>Automatic Installation:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Go to Plugins &gt; “Add New”.</li>
<li>Download the WooCommerce payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet from WordPress repository and Click &#8220;Install Now&#8221; to install the plugin. A popup window will ask you to confirm your wish to install the plugin 12.6.0.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Note:</h4>
<p>If this is the first time you&#8217;ve installed a WordPress plugin, you may need to enter the FTP login credential information. If you&#8217;ve installed the plugin before, it will still have the login information. This information is available through your web server host.</p>
<ul>
<li>Click “Proceed” to continue the installation. The resulting installation screen will list the installation as successful or note any problems during the install.</li>
<li>If successful, click &#8220;Activate Plugin&#8221; to activate it, or “Return to Plugin Installer” for further actions.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Manual Installation:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Download WooCommerce payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet to your desktop. (If downloaded as a zip archive, extract the plugin folder to your desktop.)</li>
<li>Copy the plugin folder and paste into root/wp-content/plugins/ directory.</li>
<li>Go to Plugins (Novalnet payment plugin &#8211; WooCommerce) screen and find the “Novalnet payment plugin &#8211; WooCommerce” in the list.</li>
<li>Click “Activate Plugin” to activate it.</li>
<li>Check the details in the readme file for customization and further instructions.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Now you can get your Product activation key from the Novalnet Admin Portal:</h4>
<p>For this, kindly login into the Novalnet Admin Portal:</p>
<ol>
<li>Go to http://www.novalnet.com and click on &#8220;Login&#8221; (top right). You will be redirected to Novalnet Admin Portal login form.</li>
<li>Inside the Novalnet Admin Portal, choose the tab &#8220;Projects&#8221; and click on the respective project in the list.</li>
<li>Click on the tab &#8220;API credentials&#8221;.</li>
<li>You can find the Product activation key, Payment access key and enter the keys in Novalnet global configuration. Click on the &#8220;Save changes&#8221; button to configure and save the merchant details.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Now you have all required details to finish setting up your WooCommerce webshop!</h4>
";s:3:"faq";s:3089:"
<dt id='do%20i%20require%20an%20novalnet%20merchant%20account%20before%20i%20can%20use%20the%20woocommerce%20novalnet%20payment%20plugin%3F'>
Do I require an Novalnet merchant account before I can use the WooCommerce Novalnet payment plugin?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, in order to use this plugin and access all popular online payment methods within your WooCommerce webshop you must require valid and approved Novalnet account. please contact our sales team <strong>sales@novalnet.de / 0049-89-923 068 320</strong></p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20merchant%20can%20find%20product%20activation%20key%3F'>
Where merchant can find product activation key?
</h4>
<p>
<p>To get the Product Activation Key, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; Projects: Project Information &#8211; API credentials: API Signature (Product activation key).</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20to%20configure%20server%20ip%2C%20vendor%20script%20url%20%26%20paypal%20api%3F'>
How to configure server IP, vendor script URL &amp; Paypal API?
</h4>
<p>
<p><strong>IP Address Configuration</strong></p>
<p>For all API access (Auto configuration with Product Activation Key, loading Credit Card iframe, Transaction API access, Transaction status enquiry, and update), it is required to configure a server IP address in Novalnet administration portal.</p>
<p>To configure an IP address, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; Account &#8211; Global configuration &#8211; Payment Request IP&#8217;s &#8211; Update Payment Request IP.</p>
<p><strong>Notification &amp; Webhook URL Configuration</strong></p>
<p>Notification &amp; Webhook URL is required to keep the merchant’s database/system up-to-date and synchronized with Novalnet transaction status. It is mandatory to configure the Vendor Script URL in Novalnet administration portal.</p>
<p>Novalnet system (via asynchronous) will transmit the information on each transaction and its status to the merchant’s system.</p>
<p>To configure Vendor Script URL, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; Projects: Project Information &#8211; API credentials &#8211; Vendor script URL / Notification &amp; Webhook URL.</p>
<p><strong>PayPal API Configuration</strong></p>
<p>To configure PayPal API details, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; Projects: Project Information &#8211; Payment Methods: PayPal &#8211; Configure.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20this%20plugin%20work%20with%20other%20webshop%20plugins%3F'>
Does this plugin work with other Webshop Plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>This online payment plugin only works with the WooCommerce webshop. Are you looking for other online payment modules for webshop software? Please Find the complete overview of our webshop modules on our website. https://www.novalnet.de</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:16592:"<h4>12.6.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>[New] Implemented Zero amount authorization for the payments Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Apple Pay &amp; Google Pay</li>
<li>[Removed] Payment due date configuration for Direct Debit SEPA With Payment Guarantee</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.5.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Adapted Credit/Debit Cards iframe for proper loading while using the WPML plugin</li>
<li>[Fix] Restricted duplicate order creation with same TID during communication failure</li>
<li>[Fix] Exact date information shown on the subscription notes during the &#8220;Pay for the order&#8221; process</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Payment description updated while changing the subscription payment method</li>
<li>[Enhanced] For IBAN-specific countries, the BIC field required for the Gibraltar country for the payments like Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee and Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.5.5</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Plugin made compatible for WooCommerce version 7.5.1 </li>
<li>[Fix] Handled Guest users under the ‘Pay for order’ process</li>
<li>[Fix] Amount mismatch handled for WordPress Multilingual functionality</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.5.4</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix]  Subscription free trial interval remains unchanged when payment zone is updated</li>
<li>[Fix] Subscription renewal orders placed successfully after migrating from other payment provider</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.5.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix]  Subscription change payment method update from Shop default payment to Novalnet payment</li>
<li>[Removed] Button Theme configuration for Google Pay payment</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>[Fix] Double bookings restricted for subscription transactions during subscription cycle date update</li>

</ul>

<li>[New] Callback/webhook events for payment reminders and submission to the collection agency has been added</li>

<ul>
<li>[Fixed] Fetching the order amount from the cart instead of session, to make it compatible for the WooCommerce version (above 3.2.0)</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Dynamic IP control applied through domain instead of static IP in vendor script. Actual IP of Novalnet will be extracted in real time from the domain</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.2.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>[New] Implemented Barzahlen payment method </li>
<li>[Enhanced] Optimized vendor script validation </li>
<li>[Removed] Enable debug mode configuration in Merchant script management</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.2.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fixed] Optimized Credit Card and Direct Debit SEPA script</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Adjusted opacity for form payments</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Merchant Administration Portal link has been updated in shop admin</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Date of birth field format has been updated </li>
<li>[Removed] Refund with account details from shop admin</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.2.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Custom order note not displaying</li>
<li>[Fix] Next charging date shouldn&#8217;t display for last recurring</li>
<li>[Fix] IP address issue for windows running IIS v6</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Optimized subscription configuration settings</li>
<li>[Compatible] Tested with WordPress version upto 4.8.1, WooCommerce version upto 3.1.2 and Subscription version upto 2.2.11</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.2.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Compatible] Tested with WooCommerce version upto 3.0.7 and Subscription version upto 2.2.6.</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.1.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>[New] Implemented Novalnet updates page.</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Updated payment logo for Credit Card and Invoice payment.</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Added new parameter in all API calls.</li>
<li>[Fix] Restriction of email notification to the end customer on callback execution.</li>
<li>[Fix] Issue with single iteration Subscription product (Eg: price per month for 1 month).</li>
<li>[Compatible] Tested with WordPress version 4.7.3 and Subscription version 2.1.4.</li>
</ul>
<h4>11.1.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Novalnet Merchant API configuration has been globally implemented.</li>
<li>On-hold transaction configuration (For Credit Card, Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice and PayPal).</li>
<li>Merchant script notification mail configuration.</li>
<li>Merchant can set up their Referrer ID.</li>
<li>Auto-fill for payment data (Direct Debit SEPA).</li>
<li>Fraud prevention through PIN by Callback/SMS. (For Direct Debit SEPA and Invoice).</li>
<li>Subscription management.</li>
<li>Order and transaction management.</li>
<li>VOID &amp; CAPTURE option for on-hold transaction payments (Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card, Invoice, Prepayment and PayPal).</li>
<li>Refund option for Credit Card, Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Prepayment, Instant Bank Transfer, iDEAL, PayPal, eps, giropay  and Przelewy24.</li>
<li>Transaction amount update option (For Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice and Prepayment).</li>
<li>Due date change option for Prepayment and Invoice payment.</li>
<li>Affiliate management system.</li>
<li>Auto configuration of vendor credentials.</li>
<li>Zero amount booking for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal.</li>
<li>One click shopping for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal.</li>
<li>Credit Card iframe updated.</li>
<li>Customized CSS settings for Credit Card iframe form.</li>
<li>Implemented Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Invoice with payment guarantee, giropay and Przelewy24 payments.</li>
<li>Edit option in Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal for registered customers.</li>
<li>Direct Debit SEPA overlay removed.</li>
<li>Notify URL configuration in shop backend.</li>
<li>Logo control has been implemented in global configuration.</li>
<li>Responsive templates has been implemented.</li>
<li>New booking with payment reference.</li>
</ul>
<h4>10.3.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Compatibility has been checked for latest Woocommerce version 2.3.8 &#8211; 2.6.x and subscription version 2.0.x.</li>
<li>Novalnet payment module has been optimized as per new testcase.</li>
</ul>
<h4>10.3.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Credit Card Iframe implemented.</li>
<li>Implemented giropay payment.</li>
<li>Compatibility has been checked for latest Woocommerce version 2.3.8 &#8211; 2.5.x and subscription version 2.0.x.</li>
<li>Novalnet payment modules has been optimized as per new testcase</li>
<li>Direct Debit SEPA overlay and Credit Card Type removed.</li>
<li>External plugin compatibility has been checked.</li>
<li>Compatibility has been checked for latest Woocommerce version 2.3.8 &#8211; 2.4.x and subscription version 2.0.x.</li>
</ul>
<h4>10.1.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Compatibility has been checked for WooCommerce version upto 2.4.6.</li>
</ul>
<h4>10.1.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>External plugin compatibility has been checked.</li>
<li>Payment reference has been implemented.</li>
</ul>
<h4>10.0.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>First Release</li>

/ps.w.org/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1636784";s:2:"2x";s:81:"https://ps.w.org/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1636784";}s:12:"contributors";a:1:{s:8:"novalnet";s:40:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/novalnet/";}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:15:"google-site-kit";a:29:{s:4:"name";s:68:"Site Kit by Google &#8211; Analytics, Search Console, AdSense, Speed";s:4:"slug";s:15:"google-site-kit";s:7:"version";s:7:"1.106.0";s:6:"author";s:50:"<a href="https://opensource.google.com">Google</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/google/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.2";s:6:"tested";s:3:"6.3";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:16:"requires_plugins";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";i:82;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:514;i:4;i:34;i:3;i:23;i:2;i:31;i:1;i:108;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:710;s:15:"support_threads";i:214;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:174;s:10:"downloaded";i:78597471;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2023-07-31 6:23pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2019-10-31";s:8:"homepage";s:30:"https://sitekit.withgoogle.com";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:1998:"<p>Site Kit is the official WordPress plugin from Google for insights about how people find and use your site. Site Kit is the one-stop solution to deploy, manage, and get insights from critical Google tools to make the site successful on the web. It provides authoritative, up-to-date insights from multiple Google products directly on the WordPress dashboard for easy access, all for free.</p>
<h4>Bringing the best of Google tools to WordPress</h4>
<p>Site Kit includes powerful features that make using these Google products seamless and flexible:</p>
<ul>
<li>Easy-to-understand stats directly on your WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Official stats from multiple Google tools, all in one dashboard</li>
<li>Quick setup for multiple Google tools without having to edit the source code of your site</li>
<li>Metrics for your entire site and for individual posts</li>
<li>Easy-to-manage, granular permissions across WordPress and different Google products</li>
</ul>
<h4>Supported Google tools</h4>
<p>Site Kit shows key metrics and insights from different Google products:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Search Console:</strong> Understand how Google Search discovers and displays your pages in Google Search. Track how many people saw your site in Search results, and what query they used to search for your site.</li>
<li><strong>Analytics:</strong> Explore how users navigate your site and track goals you&#8217;ve set up for your users to complete.</li>
<li><strong>AdSense:</strong> Keep track of how much your site is earning you.</li>
<li><strong>PageSpeed Insights:</strong> See how your pages perform compared to other real-world sites. Improve performance with actionable tips from PageSpeed Insights.</li>
<li><strong>Tag Manager:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Tag Manager- no code editing required. Then, manage your tags in Tag Manager.</li>
<li><strong>Optimize:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Optimize- no code editing required. Then, set up A/B tests in Optimize.</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:1809:"<p><strong>Note</strong>: Make sure that your website is live. If your website isn&#8217;t live yet, Site Kit can&#8217;t show you any data.<br />
However, if you have a staging environment in addition to your production site, Site Kit can display data from your production site in the staging environment. Learn how to use <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/staging/" rel="nofollow ugc">Site Kit with a staging environment</a>.</p>
<h4>Installation from within WordPress</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins &gt; Add New</strong>.</li>
<li>Search for <strong>Site Kit by Google</strong>.</li>
<li>Install and activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Upload the entire <code>google-site-kit</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory.</li>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins</strong>.</li>
<li>Activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>After activation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit the new <strong>Site Kit</strong> menu.</li>
<li>Follow the instructions in the setup flow.</li>
<li>Go to the main Site Kit dashboard which already displays key metrics from Search Console.</li>
<li>Connect additional Google tools under <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings</strong>. Learn more about <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/getting-started/connecting-services/" rel="nofollow ugc">which tools are right for you</a>.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:4825:"<p>For more information, visit the <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">official Site Kit website</a>.</p>

<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20free%3F'>
Is Site Kit free?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The Site Kit plugin is free and open source, and will remain so. Individual Google products included in Site Kit are subject to standard terms and fees (if any) for those products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20are%20the%20minimum%20requirements%20for%20site%20kit%3F'>
What are the minimum requirements for Site Kit?
</h4>
<p>
<p>In order to successfully install and use Site Kit, your site must meet the following requirements:</p>
<ul>
<li>WordPress version 5.2+</li>
<li>PHP version 5.6+</li>
<li>Modern browser – Internet Explorer is not supported</li>
<li>Is publicly accessible – it isn’t in maintenance mode, accessible only via password, or otherwise blocked</li>
<li>REST API is available – Site Kit must be able to communicate via REST API with Google services. To ensure that the REST API is available for your site, go to Tools &gt; Site Health.</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20my%20dashboard%20showing%20%E2%80%9Cgathering%20data%E2%80%9D%20and%20none%20of%20my%20service%20data%3F'>
Why is my dashboard showing “gathering data” and none of my service data?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It can take a few days after connecting Site Kit to a Google service for data to begin to display in your dashboard. The “gathering data” message typically appears when you’ve recently set up a Google service (i.e. just created a new Analytics account) and/or your site is new, and data is not yet available for display.</p>
<p>If you are still seeing this message after a few days, feel free to get in touch with us on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/" rel="ugc">support forum</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20aren%E2%80%99t%20any%20ads%20appearing%20on%20my%20site%20after%20i%20connected%20adsense%3F'>
Why aren’t any ads appearing on my site after I connected AdSense?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you’re new to AdSense when you connect via Site Kit, your new AdSense account and your site will need to be manually reviewed and approved for ads by the AdSense team. Ads will not display until your account and site have been approved. <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/76228" rel="nofollow ugc">Check out this guide for more information about the approval process and timeline.</a></p>
<p>You can check your approval status in Site Kit by going to <strong>Settings &gt; Connected Services &gt; AdSense</strong> and clicking <strong>Check your site status</strong>. This link will direct you to AdSense. If you see “Ready,” your account and site have been approved and should be displaying ads. If you see “Getting ready…,” your account and site are still under review and your site will not display ads until they have been approved.</p>
<p>If Site Kit has successfully added the AdSense snippet to your site and your account and site have been approved, but your site is still not showing ads, <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/#topic=3373519" rel="nofollow ugc">contact the AdSense Help Center for assistance</a>.</p>
<p>You can find more information on how Site Kit works with AdSense in our <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/managing-adsense/" rel="nofollow ugc">Managing AdSense guide</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20gdpr%20compliant%3F'>
Is Site Kit GDPR compliant?
</h4>
<p>
<p>When using Site Kit, site owners are responsible for managing notice and consent requirements – including GDPR requirements – as described in <a href="https://policies.google.com/terms" rel="nofollow ugc">Google’s Terms of Service</a>.</p>
<p>By default, Site Kit does anonymize IP addresses upon activation of the Google Analytics module. This setting can be turned off in <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings &gt; Analytics &gt; Anonymize IP addresses</strong>.</p>
<p>There are a number of third-party plugins that allow you to block Google Analytics, Tag Manager, or AdSense from capturing data until a visitor to the site consents. Some of these work natively with Site Kit by providing plugin-specific configurations. You can find out more about these by visiting our <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/gdpr-compliance-and-privacy/" rel="nofollow ugc">GDPR compliance and privacy page</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20additional%20support%3F'>
Where can I get additional support?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Please create a new topic on our <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/" rel="ugc">WordPress.org support forum</a>. Be sure to follow the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/guidelines/" rel="ugc">support forum guidelines</a> when posting.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:323757:"<h4>1.106.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update the Ad Blocking Recovery CTA text. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7357" rel="nofollow ugc">#7357</a>.</li>
<li>Update copy for the Ad Blocking Recovery setup screen, success notification and &#8220;existing tag&#8221; settings notice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7313" rel="nofollow ugc">#7313</a>.</li>
<li>Add a &#8220;Learn more&#8221; link after the &#8220;Place error protection tag&#8221; option in the AdSense setup flow and settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7295" rel="nofollow ugc">#7295</a>.</li>
<li>Update Ad Blocking Recovery message status language in settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7287" rel="nofollow ugc">#7287</a>.</li>
<li>Update key metric tiles to be full-width on mobile viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7159" rel="nofollow ugc">#7159</a>.</li>
<li>Hide Key Metric widget tiles when the feature isn&#8217;t setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7061" rel="nofollow ugc">#7061</a>.</li>
<li>Move Universal Analytics notice in settings page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6809" rel="nofollow ugc">#6809</a>.</li>
<li>Display Google Tag ID in Analytics Settings view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6769" rel="nofollow ugc">#6769</a>.</li>
<li>Replace direct usage of components from <code>@material/react-text-field</code> with the new <code>TextField</code> component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6651" rel="nofollow ugc">#6651</a>.</li>
<li>Hide Key Metric Widget area when Search Console and Google Analytics are still gathering data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6607" rel="nofollow ugc">#6607</a>.</li>
<li>Create &#8220;Top converting traffic source&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6255" rel="nofollow ugc">#6255</a>.</li>
<li>Add &#8220;Top cities driving traffic&#8221; key metric widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6252" rel="nofollow ugc">#6252</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for WooCommerce/Google Analytics with a key metric widget for &#8220;Most popular products by pageviews&#8221;. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6249" rel="nofollow ugc">#6249</a>.</li>
<li>Add the &#8220;Most engaged traffic source&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6246" rel="nofollow ugc">#6246</a>.</li>
<li>Show a tooltip when clicking &#8220;Maybe later&#8221; on the Key Metrics Setup CTA widget, and allow the widget to be dismissed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6232" rel="nofollow ugc">#6232</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix potential PHP error when refreshing profile data on the fly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7356" rel="nofollow ugc">#7356</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure AdSense CTA appears again if tooltip is ignored after dismissing the CTA widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7294" rel="nofollow ugc">#7294</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure setup success notification is always shown when completing setup for ad blocking recovery. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7288" rel="nofollow ugc">#7288</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense options cleanup issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7286" rel="nofollow ugc">#7286</a>.</li>
<li>Fix the tag ID used in the GA tracking opt-out for logged in users when tagging with a Google tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7262" rel="nofollow ugc">#7262</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the WordPress Dashboard submenu can be seen when Site Kit is the current page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6907" rel="nofollow ugc">#6907</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent layout shift in GA4 settings area when the dropdown options finish loading. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6570" rel="nofollow ugc">#6570</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.105.0</h4>

<li>Place Ad Blocking Recovery tags on the front end. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7186" rel="nofollow ugc">#7186</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that could cause zero percent in key metric widgets not to appear. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7172" rel="nofollow ugc">#7172</a>.</li>
<li>Improve creation of the GM3 checkbox component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7120" rel="nofollow ugc">#7120</a>.</li>
<li>Show notice to users who have an existing Ad Blocking Recovery tag placed on their site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6967" rel="nofollow ugc">#6967</a>.</li>
<li>Fix inconsistent focus styles in feature tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6926" rel="nofollow ugc">#6926</a>.</li>
<li>Add CTA to connect Analytics if disconnected after setting up Key Metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6265" rel="nofollow ugc">#6265</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the &#8220;Top traffic source&#8221; key metric widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6245" rel="nofollow ugc">#6245</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the design for the Key Metrics Setup CTA widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6210" rel="nofollow ugc">#6210</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug that additionally requested UA Analytics reports on the WP dashboard when dashboard view was set to GA4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7306" rel="nofollow ugc">#7306</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused PageSpeed Insights to appear in Dashboard Sharing Settings when PageSpeed Insights is not connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7197" rel="nofollow ugc">#7197</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that could cause infinite loop in Analytics setup flow if user had view-only permissions for an Analytics property. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7168" rel="nofollow ugc">#7168</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused Ad Blocking Recovery widget to appear/hide under the wrong conditions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7164" rel="nofollow ugc">#7164</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.104.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add support for tagging with Google Analytics 4 in AMP mode. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7221" rel="nofollow ugc">#7221</a>.</li>
<li>Complete Ad Blocking Recovery set up interface. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6966" rel="nofollow ugc">#6966</a>.</li>
<li>Add infrastructure for fetching and storing the Ad Blocking Recovery tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6902" rel="nofollow ugc">#6902</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add PHP version to requests for features. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7209" rel="nofollow ugc">#7209</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Analytics dashboard type to Site Health information. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7119" rel="nofollow ugc">#7119</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the Universal Analytics controls are shown in the case where the connected property belongs to another Google account and permission has been removed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7063" rel="nofollow ugc">#7063</a>.</li>
<li>Add settings controls for Ad blocking recovery tags. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6962" rel="nofollow ugc">#6962</a>.</li>
<li>Add ad blocking recovery state to the settings view for AdSense. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6961" rel="nofollow ugc">#6961</a>.</li>
<li>Show the Ad Blocking Recovery Notification on the Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6953" rel="nofollow ugc">#6953</a>.</li>
<li>Rework the Dialog component to use dialog components from the <code>googlesitekit-components</code> library instead of <code>@material/react-dialog</code> directly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6652" rel="nofollow ugc">#6652</a>.</li>
<li>Show a “Connect AdSense CTA” Key Metrics tile if AdSense is disconnected after setting up AdSense-related Key Metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6264" rel="nofollow ugc">#6264</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Connect GA tile to Key Metrics widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6263" rel="nofollow ugc">#6263</a>.</li>
<li>Create the &#8220;Top performing keywords&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6251" rel="nofollow ugc">#6251</a>.</li>
<li>Create the &#8220;Most popular content by pageviews&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6247" rel="nofollow ugc">#6247</a>.</li>
<li>Implement HaTS survey triggers for users who answers &#8220;Other&#8221; to any User Input question. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6180" rel="nofollow ugc">#6180</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate <code>TextField</code> component to our GM2 component library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6113" rel="nofollow ugc">#6113</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure Ad Blocking Recovery elements are only present when the feature is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7179" rel="nofollow ugc">#7179</a>.</li>
<li>Restore notice width in setup and settings views. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7140" rel="nofollow ugc">#7140</a>.</li>
<li>Fix the Optimize sunset banner re-appearing issue. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7138" rel="nofollow ugc">#7138</a>.</li>
<li>Fix broken view-only dashboard when Analytics isn&#8217;t shared. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7116" rel="nofollow ugc">#7116</a>.</li>
<li>Fix notices about granting view-only access when changing module settings for modules that are not shared with any roles. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6633" rel="nofollow ugc">#6633</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue in the All Traffic widget/Google Charts pie charts that caused selected elements to become de-selected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4589" rel="nofollow ugc">#4589</a>.</li>
</ul>

<li>Update the placement of the &#8220;existing GTM property&#8221; notices in the Analytics setup and settings views to reflect they are only currently relevant for Universal Analytics properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6934" rel="nofollow ugc">#6934</a>.</li>
<li>Update the URL for the &#8220;Learn what&#8217;s new&#8221; link on the &#8220;Switch to GA4 Dashboard View&#8221; banner. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6928" rel="nofollow ugc">#6928</a>.</li>

<li>Fix the svg image size issue on the &#8220;Switch to GA4 Dashboard View&#8221; banner. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6920" rel="nofollow ugc">#6920</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent the GA4 All Traffic widget from momentarily displaying in the zero data state while it&#8217;s waiting to determine the gathering data state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6913" rel="nofollow ugc">#6913</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused the GA4 Dashboard Feature Tour to delay appearing. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6909" rel="nofollow ugc">#6909</a>.</li>
<li>Update the positioning of the <code>New</code> metric badges in table headings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6904" rel="nofollow ugc">#6904</a>.</li>
<li>Update the &#8220;gathering data&#8221; time for GA4 properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6877" rel="nofollow ugc">#6877</a>.</li>
<li>Add entity ownership notice when using GA4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6851" rel="nofollow ugc">#6851</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the Unsatisfied Scopes banner remains visible until the OAuth page appears when pressing the banner CTA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6673" rel="nofollow ugc">#6673</a>.</li>
<li>Add the &#8220;Switched to GA4&#8221; notification banner to inform users that the dashboard has been switched to the GA4 view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6558" rel="nofollow ugc">#6558</a>.</li>
<li>Update wording regarding the date Universal Analytics will stop collecting data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6453" rel="nofollow ugc">#6453</a>.</li>
<li>Apply consistent placement of notices which inform users they don&#8217;t have permission to edit Analytics settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6224" rel="nofollow ugc">#6224</a>.</li>
<li>Add the migration notice to the AdSense overview widget for legacy accounts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5628" rel="nofollow ugc">#5628</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix a bug that could cause a survey to be shown again on next page load after finishing or closing. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7064" rel="nofollow ugc">#7064</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure correct widgets for Analytics are rendered on page load. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7011" rel="nofollow ugc">#7011</a>.</li>
<li>Fix potential perpetual loading state of GA4 dropdowns for secondary admin without access. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7005" rel="nofollow ugc">#7005</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent duplicate error messages from appearing in Analytics settings when another user does not have access to the Analytics account. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7004" rel="nofollow ugc">#7004</a>.</li>
<li>Fix duplicate URLs in UA popular pages list within WP dashboard widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6972" rel="nofollow ugc">#6972</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug in WordPress 6.2+ that caused issues with the GA4 support tooltip on mobile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6924" rel="nofollow ugc">#6924</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Universal Analytics property is automatically selected when GA4 Reporting is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6921" rel="nofollow ugc">#6921</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that changing to an Analytics account which doesn&#8217;t have Universal Analytics properties is detected as a change to the settings in the Analytics Settings edit page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6919" rel="nofollow ugc">#6919</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that could cause duplicate entries in the WP dashboard Popular Pages widget when using GA4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6918" rel="nofollow ugc">#6918</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure GA opt-out snippets are output when GA4 is connected without UA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6915" rel="nofollow ugc">#6915</a>.</li>
<li>Update GA4 dashboard tour to only be triggered by banner CTA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6914" rel="nofollow ugc">#6914</a>.</li>
<li>Fix appearance of the date marker on Search Funnel widget charts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6912" rel="nofollow ugc">#6912</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent chart key date markers on the All Traffic Widget chart tooltips from overlaying the chart tooltips. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6911" rel="nofollow ugc">#6911</a>.</li>
<li>Adjust positioning of key date info icon to avoid overlapping other elements. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6910" rel="nofollow ugc">#6910</a>.</li>
<li>Add &#8220;New&#8221; badges for the new GA4 metrics to widgets on the Entity Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6908" rel="nofollow ugc">#6908</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that GA4 widgets correctly display the gathering data state on the view-only dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6897" rel="nofollow ugc">#6897</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused Analytics and Analytics 4 to appear in Dashboard Sharing modules when GA4 Reporting is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6862" rel="nofollow ugc">#6862</a>.</li>
<li>Expose errors from GA4 in settings and setup interfaces. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6831" rel="nofollow ugc">#6831</a>.</li>
<li>Update banner notification layout to avoid unwanted empty space on the left. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5447" rel="nofollow ugc">#5447</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.99.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Only show the &#8220;Google tag mismatch&#8221; and &#8220;web data stream not available&#8221; notifications to the Analytics module owner. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6949" rel="nofollow ugc">#6949</a>.</li>
<li>Update source links in the Popular Pages widget for the Analytics 4 version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6871" rel="nofollow ugc">#6871</a>.</li>

<li>Enhance the experience of handling properties and web data streams which are no longer available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6763" rel="nofollow ugc">#6763</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Dashboard Sharing works without Universal Analytics being enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6745" rel="nofollow ugc">#6745</a>.</li>
<li>Allow editing and viewing Analytics settings without saving Universal Analytics settings when GA4 Reporting is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6744" rel="nofollow ugc">#6744</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Google Analytics 4 charts display correctly with zero data, by padding the data returned from the <code>runReport</code> endpoint to add zero-data rows where data is missing in cases where a single <code>date</code> dimension is requested. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6623" rel="nofollow ugc">#6623</a>.</li>
<li>Indicate key dates in Analytics charts, indicating the Universal Analytics cut-off date, or the Google Analytics 4 property creation date. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6572" rel="nofollow ugc">#6572</a>.</li>
<li>Add a feature tour for new metrics that are available on the GA4 version of the dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6554" rel="nofollow ugc">#6554</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix a potential error when attempting to autoload a class from a non-existent file. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6887" rel="nofollow ugc">#6887</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Analytics module can be recovered when only GA4 is connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6861" rel="nofollow ugc">#6861</a>.</li>

<h4>1.93.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Conditionally render Google charts on non-Site Kit screens to avoid conflicts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6439" rel="nofollow ugc">#6439</a>.</li>
<li>Add a new endpoint for the Analytics 4 module to list conversion events. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6348" rel="nofollow ugc">#6348</a>.</li>
<li>Update type scale and color tokens to match GM2+ design. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6328" rel="nofollow ugc">#6328</a>.</li>
<li>Update the in-progress state when submitting User Input answers. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6323" rel="nofollow ugc">#6323</a>.</li>
<li>Create REST endpoints to store and fetch user-selected Key Metrics settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6256" rel="nofollow ugc">#6256</a>.</li>
<li>Remove admin-wide base JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6250" rel="nofollow ugc">#6250</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance web storage clearing to only remove Site Kit items. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6237" rel="nofollow ugc">#6237</a>.</li>
<li>Add <code>GET:report</code> datapoint for Google Analytics 4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6172" rel="nofollow ugc">#6172</a>.</li>
<li>Reduce code complexity in <code>GoogleChart</code> component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6029" rel="nofollow ugc">#6029</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent the &#8220;Set up Google Analytics 4&#8230;&#8221; Tooltip from overlapping the header on page scroll. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5938" rel="nofollow ugc">#5938</a>.</li>
<li>Implement new inline edit answer interface for User Input settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5897" rel="nofollow ugc">#5897</a>.</li>
<li>Add notification to prompt users to enable auto-updates. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5853" rel="nofollow ugc">#5853</a>.</li>
<li>Simplify experience when additional scopes are required to view the dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5497" rel="nofollow ugc">#5497</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Skip outputting measurement ID specific Google Analytics disabling script when no measurement ID is configured. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6364" rel="nofollow ugc">#6364</a>.</li>
<li>Fix incorrect redirects for sites with internationalized domain names. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5868" rel="nofollow ugc">#5868</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.92.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Restore Unique Visitors chart on WP Dashboard widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6355" rel="nofollow ugc">#6355</a>.</li>
<li>Improve error handling in Google charts to avoid crashing the dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6346" rel="nofollow ugc">#6346</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance isolation of client-side storage between user sessions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6240" rel="nofollow ugc">#6240</a>.</li>
<li>Remove the Idea Hub experimental feature. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6235" rel="nofollow ugc">#6235</a>.</li>
<li>Preload <code>user-input-settings</code> REST route. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6233" rel="nofollow ugc">#6233</a>.</li>
<li>Only fetch server notifications if none have been received yet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6163" rel="nofollow ugc">#6163</a>.</li>
<li>Disable &#8220;How to improve&#8221; CTA on PageSpeed widget while re-running test. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6106" rel="nofollow ugc">#6106</a>.</li>
<li>Use the configured Google Tag ID for the Analytics 4 snippet if present. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6080" rel="nofollow ugc">#6080</a>.</li>
<li>Implement selectors and associated logic for looking up Google Tag containers and destinations. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6079" rel="nofollow ugc">#6079</a>.</li>
<li>Add Google Tag container lookup and destinations list datapoints. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6078" rel="nofollow ugc">#6078</a>.</li>
<li>Update styling of User Input Settings on the Admin Settings tab. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5896" rel="nofollow ugc">#5896</a>.</li>
<li>Improve the User Input review screen and editing interface in Settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5891" rel="nofollow ugc">#5891</a>.</li>
<li>Remove Google Analytics 4 Alpha API availability conditions and fallbacks. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5575" rel="nofollow ugc">#5575</a>.</li>
<li>Add a Material 3, web components <code>Checkbox</code> component to the codebase. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5190" rel="nofollow ugc">#5190</a>.</li>
<li>Improve error messages when encountering an internal server error in WordPress. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4997" rel="nofollow ugc">#4997</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Upgrade <code>@wordpress/data</code> to 4.23.0, <code>react</code> and <code>react-dom</code> to 16.14.0. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1769" rel="nofollow ugc">#1769</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix the formatting of Bounce Rate on the single page dashboard to always be a percentage. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5506" rel="nofollow ugc">#5506</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Site Kit logo being cut-off on Samsung Galaxy S22 and other similarly-sized phones. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5436" rel="nofollow ugc">#5436</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various PHP deprecation notices on PHP 8.1. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5110" rel="nofollow ugc">#5110</a>.</li>
</ul>
